# VSCode as C/C++ IDE

## Extensions

C/C++

CMake Tool

## Debugging - launch.json

create `.vscode/launch.json`

configure: find required dlls by specify `envFile`.

debug: in status bar of VSCode, select debugging the target.

## Run - tasks.json

create `.vscode/tasks.json`

configure: find required dlls by specify `PATH` env var in `options.env`.

run: ctrl+shift+p, run task, select task name.
